verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the priests and the Levites that went up with Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel , and Jeshua : Seraiah , Jeremiah , Ezra ,
Amariah , Malluch , Hattush ,\f + \fr 12.2 \ft Malluch: also called, Melicu\f*
Shechaniah , Rehum , Meremoth ,\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Shechaniah: also called, Shebaniah\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Rehum: also called, Harim\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Meremoth: also called, Meraioth\f*
Iddo , Ginnetho , Abijah ,\f + \fr 12.4 \ft Ginnetho: also called, Ginnethon\f*
Miamin , Maadiah , Bilgah ,\f + \fr 12.5 \ft Miamin: also called, Miniamin\f*\f + \fr 12.5 \ft Maadiah: also called, Moadiah\f*
Shemaiah , and Joiarib , Jedaiah ,
Sallu , Amok , Hilkiah , Jedaiah. These \add were\add* the chief of the priests and of their brethren in the days of Jeshua.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft Sallu: also called, Sallai\f*

Moreover the Levites : Jeshua , Binnui , Kadmiel , Sherebiah , Judah , \add and\add* Mattaniah , \add which was\add* over the thanksgiving , he and his brethren.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft the thanksgiving: that is, the psalms of thanksgiving\f*
Also Bakbukiah and Unni , their brethren , \add were\add* over against them in the watches. \p
¶ And Jeshua begat Joiakim , Joiakim also begat Eliashib , and Eliashib begat Joiada ,
And Joiada begat Jonathan , and Jonathan begat Jaddua.
And in the days of Joiakim were priests , the chief of the fathers : of Seraiah , Meraiah ; of Jeremiah , Hananiah ;
Of Ezra , Meshullam ; of Amariah , Jehohanan ;
Of Melicu , Jonathan ; of Shebaniah , Joseph ;
Of Harim , Adna ; of Meraioth , Helkai ;
Of Iddo , Zechariah ; of Ginnethon , Meshullam ;
Of Abijah , Zichri ; of Miniamin , of Moadiah , Piltai ;
Of Bilgah , Shammua ; of Shemaiah , Jehonathan ;
And of Joiarib , Mattenai ; of Jedaiah , Uzzi ;
Of Sallai , Kallai ; of Amok , Eber ;
Of Hilkiah , Hashabiah ; of Jedaiah , Nethaneel. \p
¶ The Levites in the days of Eliashib , Joiada , and Johanan , and Jaddua , \add were\add* recorded chief of the fathers : also the priests , to the reign of Darius the Persian.
The sons of Levi , the chief of the fathers , \add were\add* written in the book of the chronicles , even until the days of Johanan the son of Eliashib.

And the chief of the Levites : Hashabiah , Sherebiah , and Jeshua the son of Kadmiel , with their brethren over against them, to praise \add and\add* to give thanks , according to the commandment of David the man of God , ward over against ward.

Mattaniah , and Bakbukiah , Obadiah , Meshullam , Talmon , Akkub , \add were\add* porters keeping the ward at the thresholds of the gates.\f + \fr 12.25 \ft thresholds: or, treasuries, or, assemblies\f*
These \add were\add* in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua , the son of Jozadak , and in the days of Nehemiah the governor , and of Ezra the priest , the scribe. \p

¶ And at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem they sought the Levites out of all their places , to bring them to Jerusalem , to keep the dedication with gladness , both with thanksgivings , and with singing , \add with\add* cymbals , psalteries , and with harps.
And the sons of the singers gathered themselves together , both out of the plain country round about Jerusalem , and from the villages of Netophathi ;
Also from the house of Gilgal , and out of the fields of Geba and Azmaveth : for the singers had builded them villages round about Jerusalem.
And the priests and the Levites purified themselves, and purified the people , and the gates , and the wall.

Then I brought up the princes of Judah upon the wall , and appointed two great \add companies of them that gave\add* thanks , \add whereof one\add* went on the right hand upon the wall toward the dung gate :
And after them went Hoshaiah , and half of the princes of Judah ,
And Azariah , Ezra , and Meshullam ,
Judah , and Benjamin , and Shemaiah , and Jeremiah ,

And \add certain\add* of the priests’ sons with trumpets ; \add namely\add*, Zechariah the son of Jonathan , the son of Shemaiah , the son of Mattaniah , the son of Michaiah , the son of Zaccur , the son of Asaph :
And his brethren , Shemaiah , and Azarael , Milalai , Gilalai , Maai , Nethaneel , and Judah , Hanani , with the musical instruments of David the man of God , and Ezra the scribe before them.
And at the fountain gate , which was over against them, they went up by the stairs of the city of David , at the going up of the wall , above the house of David , even unto the water gate eastward.

And the other \add company of them that gave\add* thanks went over against \add them\add*, and I after them, and the half of the people upon the wall , from beyond the tower of the furnaces even unto the broad wall ;

And from above the gate of Ephraim , and above the old gate , and above the fish gate , and the tower of Hananeel , and the tower of Meah , even unto the sheep gate : and they stood still in the prison gate.
So stood the two \add companies of them that gave\add* thanks in the house of God , and I, and the half of the rulers with me:
And the priests ; Eliakim , Maaseiah , Miniamin , Michaiah , Elioenai , Zechariah , \add and\add* Hananiah , with trumpets ;

And Maaseiah , and Shemaiah , and Eleazar , and Uzzi , and Jehohanan , and Malchijah , and Elam , and Ezer. And the singers sang loud , with Jezrahiah \add their\add* overseer.\f + \fr 12.42 \ft sang…: Heb. made their voice to be heard\f*

Also that day they offered great sacrifices , and rejoiced : for God had made them rejoice with great joy : the wives also and the children rejoiced : so that the joy of Jerusalem was heard even afar off. \p

¶ And at that time were some appointed over the chambers for the treasures , for the offerings , for the firstfruits , and for the tithes , to gather into them out of the fields of the cities the portions of the law for the priests and Levites : for Judah rejoiced for the priests and for the Levites that waited.\f + \fr 12.44 \ft of the law: that is, appointed by the law\f*\f + \fr 12.44 \ft for Judah…: Heb. for the joy of Judah\f*\f + \fr 12.44 \ft waited: Heb. stood\f*
And both the singers and the porters kept the ward of their God , and the ward of the purification , according to the commandment of David , \add and\add* of Solomon his son.
For in the days of David and Asaph of old \add there were\add* chief of the singers , and songs of praise and thanksgiving unto God.

And all Israel in the days of Zerubbabel , and in the days of Nehemiah , gave the portions of the singers and the porters , every day his portion : and they sanctified \add holy things\add* unto the Levites ; and the Levites sanctified \add them\add* unto the children of Aaron.\f + \fr 12.47 \ft sanctified: that is, set apart\f*
